summary: This is a bat file which gives you a variety of things, sets your level 81, all perks and all skills at 100
descriptionHtml:
Unzip into your Skyrim directory! Usually C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

This is a batch file which sets your level at 81, all skills at 100 and all perks and gives you 200 of each ultimate potion and sets your health, stamina and magicka at 800. Gives you the full nightingale armor with the nightingale bow and 2000 ebony arrows. Also gives you 20 grand and black soul gems, both emtpy and full.

You need to zoom out your character and click on it in the console (or type prid 14) and then bat ultimacy
I made it so you can use it on other characters as well by clicking on them in the console and then type bat ultimacy

Do with it as you wish, distribute it as you please if you give me credit for it.
author: Theshawty
